verses.verse: I <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> he has <S%H5186>inclined<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, therefore will I <S%H7121>call<s%> on him as <S%H3117>long<s%> as I <S%H3117>live.<s%>

The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me, and the <S%H4712>pains<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> got <S%H4672>hold<s%> on me: I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>
Then <S%H7121>called<s%> I on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> you, <S%H4422>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H2587>Gracious<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> yes, our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7355>merciful.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H6612>simple:<s%> I was <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H1809>low,<s%> and he <S%H3467>helped<s%> me.
<S%H7725>Return<s%> to your <S%H4496>rest,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1580>dealt<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with you.
For you have <S%H2502>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears,<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling.<s%>
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H7725>render<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8408>benefits<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> me?
I will <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3368>Precious<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H4194>death<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H577>truly<s%> I am your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> I am your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid:<s%> you have <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>
I will <S%H2076>offer<s%> to you the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
In the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
